Html:
Hi,

I'm wanting to do a number of things that I just can't work out, any help would be wonderful!

  1. Change the colour of the axis, both the grid and the tick marks
  2. Move the Y axis ticks and tick labels to the right

Thanks!

Hey all,

I figured out how to do number 2 easily after searching through the code and I modified the source so that number 1 can be done.
